channel.title: I've portforwared, set up a no-ip...Made a static ip... [pics]
channel.description:
[b][u]Well... lets see... I've done port forwarded... [/u][/b]
[URL=http://img246.imageshack.us/my.php?image=portforwaredwl8.jpg][IMG]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/3829/portforwaredwl8.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b][u]I've done no-ip...[/u][/b] [URL=http://img246.imageshack.us/my.php?image=noipyr7.jpg][IMG]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/1109/noipyr7.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b][u][s]And i've done a static ip...[/s][/u][/b]
[URL=http://img137.imageshack.us/my.php?image=ipv5hn9.jpg][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/6648/ipv5hn9.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
... I've done everything and people can not log in... Although they can log in on hamachi. Also, I have vista if that helps anyway...
Thanks Ty.!

item.title: I've portforwared, set up a no-ip...Made a static ip... [pics]
item.dc:creator: @_InSanePk [InSanePk]
item.description:
@_InSanePk wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:6, topic:191847”]You don’t need a static IP… I host my server on my Vista perfectly… As well a private World of Warcraft server.[/quote]I changed the static ip so it finds its self. That still didn’t help :(.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 04:05:55 PM[/size][hr]Ehh

Read full topic

item.title: I've portforwared, set up a no-ip...Made a static ip... [pics]
item.dc:creator: @_InSanePk [InSanePk]
item.description:
@_InSanePk wrote:

[quote=“runormal, post:4, topic:191847”]Fire Wall did you do that

IF you did

i made this tut totday

try it

but alot of people ask for fucking help with linksys and it pisses the shit out of me because its so fucking easy

How to Port Forward With A Linkysys Router

Table of conents

  1. Getting ip

  2. (SKIP THIS STEP IF STEP 1 WORKS FINE) 2. fixing the error “ipconfig” is not reconiqized as a internal or external command, operable progam or camand

  3. Port Forwarding

  4. Application and Gaming

  5. getting your ip
    Ok first we need your ip, So go to Start -> run , type in cmd and then type in ipconfig

  1. fixing the error “ipconfig” is not reconiqized as a internal or external command, operable progam or camand

  1. Port forwarding

Alright type in 192.168.1.1

The pass should be admin if its not

  1. Look in your router manual see if its in their
  2. ask your parents
  3. Call your isp see if they know
  4. buy a new router


Alrifght see the line from the ipconfig command?

Ipv4 Adress see how mine is 192.168.1.254

Change last 3 diggits the Starting Ip box (squared in red) to what ever yours is

Then go to the “application and gaming tab”

  1. Application and Gaming tab

Name it mopar so you know what it is port 43594 , both and change the digits in the box

Any problems just post here[/quote]
I did everything your tut said… And it still didn’t help :(.

Read full topic

item.title: I've portforwared, set up a no-ip...Made a static ip... [pics]
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

Fire Wall did you do that

IF you did

i made this tut totday

try it

but alot of people ask for fucking help with linksys and it pisses the shit out of me because its so fucking easy

How to Port Forward With A Linkysys Router

Table of conents

  1. Getting ip

  2. (SKIP THIS STEP IF STEP 1 WORKS FINE) 2. fixing the error “ipconfig” is not reconiqized as a internal or external command, operable progam or camand

  3. Port Forwarding

  4. Application and Gaming

  5. getting your ip
    Ok first we need your ip, So go to Start -> run , type in cmd and then type in ipconfig

  1. fixing the error “ipconfig” is not reconiqized as a internal or external command, operable progam or camand

  1. Port forwarding

Alright type in 192.168.1.1

The pass should be admin if its not

  1. Look in your router manual see if its in their
  2. ask your parents
  3. Call your isp see if they know
  4. buy a new router


Alrifght see the line from the ipconfig command?

Ipv4 Adress see how mine is 192.168.1.254

Change last 3 diggits the Starting Ip box (squared in red) to what ever yours is

Then go to the “application and gaming tab”

  1. Application and Gaming tab

Name it mopar so you know what it is port 43594 , both and change the digits in the box

Any problems just post here

item.title: I've portforwared, set up a no-ip...Made a static ip... [pics]
item.dc:creator: @_InSanePk [InSanePk]
item.description:
@_InSanePk wrote:

Well… lets see… I’ve done port forwarded…

I’ve done no-ip…

And i’ve done a static ip…

… I’ve done everything and people can not log in…
Although they can log in on hamachi.
Also, I have vista if that helps anyway…

Thanks
Ty.!
